vlive.korean: 예뻤죠 솔직히? It looked pretty good, didn't it? 듣기 View video NCT : 해벌
vlive.english: It looked pretty good, didn't it?

vlive.korean: 솔직히 못 먹겠다 이 생각하죠? You think you can't eat this, right? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 치킨 100마리도 먹을 것 같은 식성 #스타로드 09
vlive.english: You think you can't eat this, right?

vlive.korean: 이건 너무 하지 않아요, 솔직히? Isn't it too terrible, to be honest? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.19 뉴이스트의 2020 왁자지껄 운수대통 #1
vlive.english: Isn't it too terrible, to be honest?

vlive.korean: [한 번만 봐줘요] 솔직히 어제까지... [Please cut us some slack] To be honest... We had it yesterday. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Please cut us some slack] To be honest... We had it yesterday.

vlive.korean: 솔직히 여기에 신발만 신고 이것만 없으면 - 근데 신어야 돼 감기 걸려~ Honestly, if he wears shoes and this wasn't here.. - Wear shoes! You'll catch a cold! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: Honestly, if he wears shoes and this wasn't here.. - Wear shoes! You'll catch a cold!

examples.korean: I tackled him about the money he owed me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그가 내게 빌린 돈에 대해 그에게 솔직히 말을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I tackled him about the money he owed me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: To put it plainly, he’s a crook. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 솔직히 말한다면 그는 사기꾼이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: To put it plainly, he’s a crook. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I didn’t honestly think he’d pass the exam but he came up trumps on the day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 솔직히 그가 시험에 합격할 거라고 생각하지 않았는데, 그가 그날 예상 외로 잘 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t honestly think he’d pass the exam but he came up trumps on the day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They frankly admitted their responsibility. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 솔직히 자신들의 책임을 인정했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They frankly admitted their responsibility. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Honestly, you’re impossible at times! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 솔직히 말해서 넌 가끔 정말 난감할 때가 있어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Honestly, you’re impossible at times! Add to Wordbook
